biotools.summary: Avatar is a standalone software for analysis and visualisation of alteration data. Avatar features interactively customizable alteration plots, extensive data import capabilities and a multi-objective optimization algorithm to find alteration patterns, e.g. gene sets with mutually exclusive alterations or small gene sets with high sample coverage. License: EPL-2.0 (https://spdx.org/licenses/EPL-2.0.html)
